P

parseMessage() - Method in class testPages.MessagePassingServer
 
parseUpdateString(String) - Method in class clueClient.BoardModel
Purpose: parse through the string to create the board update array
Preconditions: there has been an update message received from the server with cells specified for updating on the board object
Postconditions: there has been an array created for board cell updating
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- split the string on the ";" (semicolon) characters into SPLIT_1
- FOR EACH string in SPLIT_1:
- - split the string on the "," (comma) characters into 3 new strings, STR_A, STR_B, STR_C, STR_D
- - call update(STR_A, STR_B, STR_C, STR_D)
END

NOTE: The string passed to this method should be formatted as follows:
"X1,Y1,STATE1,CLICKABLE;X2,Y2,STATE2,CLICKABLE;X3,Y4,STATE3,CLICKABLE;...;Xn,Yn,STATE4,CLICKABLE"
Tuples of the form (X,Y,STATE) are separated by a semicolon, ";"
X: the x coordinate of the cell to update
Y: the y coordinate of the cell to update
STATE: how should the cell be updated (see "REPO://src/SocektStringProtocol.txt" for a full rundown of socket string syntax)
Piece - Variable in class clueServer.GameBoard
contains all the information on player locations
pieceName - Variable in class clueServer.Player
the name of the piece to which this player is assigned
pieceNames - Static variable in class utils.Utilities
Array representing the names of the player pieces This will allow easy changing of players' names for customizing the experience.
Pieces - Class in clueServer
Class semantics and roles:
Pieces keeps track of player locations throughout the game.
Pieces() - Constructor for class clueServer.Pieces
Constructor: initializes the player positions
Parameters: none
Pieces.position - Class in clueServer
Private Class: position
Purpose: creates an object to act as a struct for holding two properties that will need to be used together throughout Pieces.
Pieces.position(int, int) - Constructor for class clueServer.Pieces.position
Constructor: takes an X coordinate, Y coordinate and makes an X, Y pair
PiecesTest - Class in testPages
Class semantics and roles:
This class is used to test the functionality of the Pieces class and its methods.
PiecesTest() - Constructor for class testPages.PiecesTest
 
play() - Method in class clueServer.Server
Purpose: Start game play on and alert all classes lower on the class-hierarchy of game play

Precondition: All classes necessary for game-play have been loaded and initialized
Postcondition: The game has begun
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- WHILE the game is not over (a player has not won, all have not lost OR all players are not removed):
- - IF current player designated to take a turn is removed from play: - - - call Server.computerPlayer()
- - - continue loop
- - listen on the socket for the current player
- - call corresponding method based on the result of the socket communication
- - - move
- - - - call GameLogic.move() method
- - - - get logic.board.display property (this is the String[][] representation of the board)
- - - - communicate that to Client on Player object who has active designation (a not true Player.isComputerPlayer() return value)
- - - - read the message from Client regarding selected position (X,Y coord)
- - - - call logic.board.piece.relocate(X,Y) to move player
- - - - call logic.board.serialize()
- - - - get logic.board.display property (this is the String[][] representation of the board)
- - - - communicate board model from above step to ALL Players
- - - - read from client for next step (accuse, guess, endturn)
- - - guess
- - - - call logic.guess() method.
Player - Class in clueServer
Class semantics and roles:
Class that describes a player.
Player() - Constructor for class clueServer.Player
Default Constructor
Takes 0 arguments Constructor that creates a player
Player(String, Socket, String, Users) - Constructor for class clueServer.Player
Constructor that creates a player
Takes 4 arguments
playerArr - Variable in class clueServer.Users
representation of structure of all players.
playerName - Variable in class clueServer.Player
the name the player (Client-side) has provided for interacting with the other players
playerOn - Variable in class clueClient.BoardModel.Cell
if non-empty, the string is the value ofthe player occupying the cell
PlayerTesting - Class in testPages
Class semantics and roles:
This class is used to test the functionality of the Player object and its methods.
PlayerTesting() - Constructor for class testPages.PlayerTesting
 
port - Variable in class clueServer.ServerListener
the port number
Positions - Variable in class clueServer.Pieces
